column4: hi ive set up a crontab to iniate a rsync every 10 minutes to copy over /var/mail from one server to another. it works when using root but not a standard user. Can some please confirm if i have to be a root user to touch /var/mail?
it's owned by root:mail on my system, so you'd need to be either the mail or root user, yes.
use "sudo crontab -u mail -e" to put it in mail's crontab, perhaps?
